title: Safety Game
sinopse:
Kashima Seiki, a timid doctor, admires Tomomura Masafumi, the president of the Tomomura Hospital, who is starting to do cross-dressing. No matter how much Kashima Seiki admires him, he still can't convey his feelings, so he wants to give up on this love because they are business partners. However...?

(Source: MU)
